column2: Kohl's names Walgreens marketing head as COOCORRECTED-UPDATE 1-Kohl's appoints Walgreens marketing head COO Nov 17 Department store operator Kohl's Corp  appointed Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc Chief Marketing Officer Sona Chawla to the newly created position of chief operating officer.
